description: Triangle T(m,R) (1 <= R <= m) giving shortest possible length n of an [n,n-m] binary linear code with covering radius R.
references: G. D. Cohen et al., Covering Codes, North-Holland, 1997, p. 202.
links: Index entries for sequences related to covering codes
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 08 2001
extensions: The next entry, T(8,2), is 25 or 26.
